node.name: MisterQ Explorer Eclipse Plugin for IBM WebSphere MQ
node.shortdescription:
MisterQ Explorer is a light-weight explorer tool for IBM WebSphere MQ queues, channels and messages. It is developed as a plugin for the Eclipse platform.
With MisterQ Explorer you may

  • create multiple queue manager configurations and connections
  • browse queues and channels and their properties
  • filter and quick-find queues and channels
  • browse and investigate messages and their payloads in different formats
  • send text files to queues
node.body:
MisterQ Explorer is a light-weight explorer tool for IBM WebSphere MQ queues, channels and messages. It is developed as a plugin for the Eclipse platform.
With MisterQ Explorer you may

  • create multiple queue manager configurations and connections
  • browse queues and channels and their properties
  • filter and quick-find queues and channels
  • browse and investigate messages and their payloads in different formats
  • send text files to queues
